instruction.title: Emission wavelength
instruction.description: Center wavelength of used emission/detection filter

instruction.title: Refractive Index
instruction.description: Refractive index of immersion medium e.g. 1.0 (air), 1.33 (water), 1.52 (oil) etc.

instruction.title: Units
instruction.description: This field define the used unit in all the program.\nWe recommend to use Âµm.

instruction.title: Space between stacks
instruction.description: Please specify here the z-plane spacing used for the acquisition of\nthe image stack(s).

instruction.title: Voxel Size
instruction.description: Voxel size in specimen space\ni.e., voxel width and height = pixel width and height divided by the total magnification\nvoxel depth = z-plane spacing

instruction.title: Bead Size
instruction.description: diameter of the fluorescence beads used

instruction.title: Camera Pixel Size
instruction.description: this value (also called pixel pitch) can be found in the spec-sheet of your camera

instruction.title: Magnification
instruction.description: total magnification is the product of the magnification of the objective e.g. 60x (which is given on the objective) and any secondary magnification which might have been used e.g. 1.5x, i.e., 60x * 1.5x = 90x

instruction.title: Custom Voxels Dimensions or Auto calculated Voxels Dimensions
Save all report in one PDF
instruction.description: If you check this box, only one PDF containing all the PSF Report will be created.\nIf you don't check this box, a PDF file will be created for each bead.
